description.en: EtherGem, "EGEM," is the stable pure no pre mine coin with applied technologies peernet and per block endowment. True to its roots as a cryptocurrency, the Proof of Work mining community will always be a part of the EGEM future and is the foundation of the EGEM launch. There is no ICO on EGEM and EGEM is its own primary blockchain, not just a token or concept on another chain.
